node.description: The shaman is a well respected and devoted healer and mystic. He spends his time curing the ailments of the inhabitants of this village, or those of any strangers that may pass by.
node.long_descr: The village shaman tends to the weak and infirm here.

node.description: While the knapper's primary job is to craft tools for the village, such is his skill that he may also be able to repair your equipment. Contact with merchants from more advanced civilisations to the south have made him remarkably conversant with the properties of metals such as copper and silver and alloys such as bronze.
node.long_descr: The village flint-knapper is here repairing crude tools.

node.description: This fellow is possessed of much darker skin and eyes than his current neighbors, hailing as he does from the island kingdoms far to the south. He has brought with him a variety of bronze arms and armor, as well as the occasional crude iron oddity.
node.long_descr: A swarthy southern trader is here hawking his wares.

node.description: Type list to see what he has to offer.
node.long_descr: A tough mercenary offers to hire out his men to you.

behavior.buys: scroll wand staff potion pill spellbook tattoo

node.description: This young woman, one of the chief's many daughters, has travelled far and wide, and gathered a variety of exotic herbs and roots that she blends into marvellous potions. They taste even worse than they smell...
node.long_descr: The village witchdoctor is here selling a variety of potions and brews.

node.description: Age may have taken what beauty this crone once possessed, but it hasn't robbed her of her wits. She is more knowledgable in the properties of items than anyone else in the known world (which, admittedly, doesn't cover very much. In fact, to these villagers it is about as far as you can see on a clear day).
node.long_descr: The village wise woman cracks a toothless grin as you enter.

node.description: When he has the time, this impossibly huge man will gladly sell you a pet that he has domesticated, though from the look of it you may have doubts in his ability to exact obedience. That bear sure doesn't look tame...
node.long_descr: The village beastmaster is here wrestling with a large bear.

behavior.buys: light treasure trash container key jewelry

node.description: This stout hunter spends six months of the year trapping for fur, and the rest of the year fashioning and selling basic equipment.
node.long_descr: A grizzled northerner offers to sell you some supplies.

node.description: The crop was good this year, and the villagers have sufficient to sell to travellers and other villagers.
node.long_descr: A daughter of the tribe is here selling food.

node.description: The art of brewing is held sacred by the northern tribes, and the brewers are considered holy men. In accordance with their beliefs, the brewers hand out samples of their sacred draught to all who pass by, and while there is no real cost, a small "donation" to the sacred coffer is expected. And when the brewer is the size of a grizzly bear, few refuse.
node.long_descr: The village brewer is handing out samples of his sacred drink.

node.description: The hedgehog looks like a cute, little, fierce fighter.
node.long_descr: A hedgehog, well, does nothing at you.

node.description: The otter looks like a fierce fighter.
node.long_descr: A loyal, sleek growls at you.

node.description: The hawk looks like a fierce fighter.
node.long_descr: A fierce but loyal hawk is here.

node.description: The grizzly bear looks like a strong, fierce fighter.
node.long_descr: A large, loyal grizzly bear is here.

node.description: The aurochs is a BAD ASS.
node.long_descr: A HUGE Aurochs stomps its feet and lowers its head to charge.

node.description: The village champion once tore the head off a rabid Mastodon with his thumbs. Imagine what he could do to you...
node.long_descr: The village champion flexes his mighty thews and grins at you.

node.description: This fellow may not speak your language well, but the language he does know very well makes conversation suddenly become much simpler- MONEY.
node.long_descr: A hook-nosed merchant from the desert kingdoms rubs his hands together.

node.description: This strapping giant of a woman has flaming red hair and biceps bigger than your thighs. She has ruled this village wisely for many years, through lean times and times of plenty, and her people have the utmost faith in her ability. Time and the birth of many children have not softened her well-muscled frame - she is still a very attractive woman, and the men of the village (and some women too) vie for her favours.
node.long_descr: The village chieftain welcomes you to her village.

node.description: The villagers are a hardy lot, toughened by their environment and their rugged lifestyle, and you marvel at their good condition as they pass.
node.long_descr: A fur-clad villager hurries by.

node.description: The villagers are a hardy lot, toughened by their environment and their rugged lifestyle, and you marvel at their good condition as they pass.
node.long_descr: A fur-clad villager hurries by.

node.description: The children of the village are a rough and tumble lot, used to working hard and playing harder.
node.long_descr: A child engages in rough horse play with other village children.

node.description: When he was young, this poor fellow had his skull staved in by a horse kick.
node.long_descr: The village idiot gawks at you.

node.description: This fellow has evidently made many generous donations to the village brewer.
node.long_descr: A village drunk.

node.description: The inhabitants of this village are a tough lot, but not ungenerous, and it is likely that this fellow will have a roof over his head soon, provided by one of the more prosperous villagers.
node.long_descr: A beggar sits in the dirt asking for donations.

node.description: This unsavory fellow preys on the rich foreign merchants from the south.
node.long_descr: A thief adroitly cuts the strings of another fat merchant's purse.

node.description: This wolf has strayed in from the wild, driven by hunger. The villagers are quick to repel such unwelcome wildlife, and it is only a matter of time before the militia run it off.
node.long_descr: A scrawny wolf is here looking for food.

node.description: These mangy black rodents came with the merchants from the south, hidden amongst their goods, and have quickly become a nuisance, being scavengers and carriers of disease.
node.long_descr: A black rat.

node.description: This mongrel is the unwanted offspring of some hunter's sled dogs, left to fend for itself here in the village.
node.long_descr: A stray dog whines piteously at you.

node.description: Like most civilizations of the time, the northern villagers have no organised standing military or police force. However, the recent influx of foreigners and bandits has necessitated the introduction of a militia to keep the peace.
node.long_descr: A member of the village militia eyes you suspiciously.
node.short_descr: a member of the village militia

node.description: Like most civilizations of the time, the northern villagers have no organised standing military or police force. However, the recent influx of foreigners and bandits has necessitated the introduction of a militia to keep the peace.
node.long_descr: A member of the village militia eyes you suspiciously.

off.add: bash disarm dodge kick parry trip

node.short_descr: a member of the village militia

node.description: Like most civilizations of the time, the northern villagers have no organised standing military or police force. However, the recent influx of foreigners and bandits has necessitated the introduction of a militia to keep the peace.
node.long_descr: A member of the village militia hefts a large club and eyes you suspiciously.

off.add: bash disarm dodge kick parry trip

node.short_descr: a member of the village militia

node.description: This Merc looks big and tough. Better be careful.
node.long_descr: A Minoan mercenary scowls menacingly at you.

off.add: bash berserk dodge kick kick_dirt parry

node.description: This Merc looks big and tough. Better be careful.
node.long_descr: An Assyrian Mercenary scowls menacingly at you.

node.description: This Merc looks big and tough. Better be careful.
node.long_descr: An Egyptian mercenary scowls menacingly at you.

node.description: This Merc looks big and tough. Better be careful.
node.long_descr: A Trojan mercenary scowls menacingly at you.

node.description: This Merc looks big and tough. Better be careful.
node.long_descr: A Nubian mercenary scowls menacingly at you.

node.description: This Merc looks big and tough. Better be careful.
node.long_descr: A Mycenaean mercenary scowls menacingly at you.

node.description: The key to the village gates.
node.name: key

node.description: A beer barrel has been left here.
node.name: barrel beer

node.description: A beer bottle has been left here.
node.name: bottle beer

node.description: A dark bottle of ale has been left here.
node.name: bottle ale
node.short_descr: a bottle of home brew ale

node.description: A firebreather has been left here.
node.name: bottle firebreather

node.description: A dark bottle has been left here.
node.name: bottle local
node.short_descr: a bottle of brewer's specialty ("Holy Water")

node.description: A large torch.
node.name: torch

node.description: A stone lamp that uses animal fat as fuel has been left here.
node.name: lamp

node.description: A yellow brew.
node.name: brew yellow

node.description: A buffalo water skin is on the floor.
node.name: skin water buffalo

node.description: A large jug of water sloshes on the floor.
node.name: jug water

node.description: A heavy club sheathed in lead lies here.
node.name: club

node.description: A bone mace lies here.
node.name: mace

node.description: A bronze dagger lies here.
node.name: dagger

node.description: A broad, heavy bronze blade lies here.
node.name: blade sword

node.description: A pair of sandals lies here.
node.name: sandals

node.description: A belt crafted of hide is curled up here.
node.name: belt

node.description: A bronze helm.
node.name: bronze helm

node.description: A rough fur cloak is here.
node.name: cloak

node.description: A bronze ring.
node.name: ring

node.description: Black bread.
node.name: black bread

node.description: A sour cheese.
node.name: cheese

node.description: A strip of unidentifiable dried meat.
node.name: dried meat

node.description: An egg (raw), warm from the nest.
node.name: egg

node.description: A foul potion rolls around here.
node.name: potion

node.description: The village totem stands here.
node.name: totem

node.description: The champion's wolf's head is here.
node.name: wolf head

node.description: The chief's oak club is lying here in the dirt.
node.name: club

node.description: A wooden stick.
node.name: stick

node.description: A wooden club is lying here.
node.name: wooden club

node.description: A boiled leather jerkin is lying here.
node.name: boiled leather jerkin

node.description: A rune-covered bone bracelet is lying here.
node.name: bone bracelet

node.description: A fur cloak is lying here.
node.name: fur cloak

node.description: A boar tusk helm lies here.
node.name: helm

node.description: An ox-hide shield lies here.
node.name: shield

node.description: A sturdy throwing spear has been thrust into the ground here.
node.name: spear

node.description: A blank papyrus is here.
node.name: papyrus

node.description: A shimmering potion is here.
node.name: potion

node.description: A magical stone gate allows one to pass through to other worlds.
node.name: gate

node.description: You are standing outside the wooden hut where the Shaman of the village resides. Paths stretch out to the east, south and west from here.
node.name: Outside the Shaman's Hut

node.description: You cough as you enter the smoky interior of this cramped hut, your eyes watering as the odor of some bubbling concoction in an iron cauldron wafts toward you. In the center of this hut the shaman awaits, quietly meditating. A variety of furs, bones, charms and trinkets line the walls, doubtless serving as focii for the shaman's mystic powers.
node.name: The Interior of the Shaman's Hut

node.description: You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.
node.name: A Path in the Village

node.description: You are walking along a path of packed earth that heads north toward the Shaman's hut.
node.name: A Path in the Village

node.description: You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.
node.name: A Path in the Village

node.description: You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.
node.name: A Path in the Village

node.description: You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.
node.name: A Path in the Village

node.description: You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.
node.name: A Path in the Village

node.description: You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.
node.name: A Path in the Village

node.description: You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening. The village square outside the Shaman's hut lies a short way to the north of here.
node.name: A Path in the Village

node.description: You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.
node.name: A Path in the Village

node.description: You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.
node.name: A Path in the Village

node.description: You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening. Several children suddenly rush by, immersed in some strange activity, the rules of which are quite unfathomable to you.
node.name: A Path in the Village

node.description: You are approaching the western gates of the village, which are constantly patrolled by the militia. There is no-one else about here, as the concentration of residences and shops is nearer to the center of the village.
node.name: Approaching the Western Gate

node.description: You are approaching the eastern gates of the village, which are constantly patrolled by the militia. There is no-one else about here, as the concentration of residences and shops is nearer to the center of the village.
node.name: Approaching the Eastern Gate

node.description: You have reached the westernmost extent of the village. To the west lie the stout wooden gates, set in the wooden barrier that surrounds the village. Members of the militia, on the lookout for bandits and wolves, grant you a cursory nod as they go about their duties.
node.name: Inside the Western Gates

node.description: You have reached the easternmost extent of the village. To the east lie the stout wooden gates, set in the wooden barrier that surrounds the village. Members of the militia, on the lookout for bandits and wolves, grant you a cursory nod as they go about their duties.
node.name: Inside the Eastern Gates

node.description: You are standing outside the Gates at the western end of town. They currently stand open, but the militia are ready at a moment's notice to slam them shut and bar them with heavy wooden crossbeams bound with rare iron imported from the south.
node.name: Outside the Western Gates

node.description: You are standing outside the Gates at the eastern end of town. They currently stand open, but the militia are ready at a moment's notice to slam them shut and bar them with heavy wooden crossbeams bound with rare iron imported from the south.
node.name: Outside the Eastern Gates

node.description: You are travelling along a broad path comprised of hard earth packed down by the steps of thousands of travellers over the many years. This path circles the wooden walls of the village, and from here you can see some of the larger structures within.
node.name: A Dirt Path

node.description: You are travelling along a broad path comprised of hard earth packed down by the steps of thousands of travellers over the many years. This path circles the wooden walls of the village, and from here you can see some of the larger structures within.
node.name: A Dirt Path

node.description: You are travelling along a broad path comprised of hard earth packed down by the steps of thousands of travellers over the many years. This path circles the wooden walls of the village, and from here you can see some of the larger structures within.
node.name: A Dirt Path

node.description:
You are travelling along a broad path comprised of hard earth packed down by the steps of thousands of travellers over the many years. This path circles the wooden walls of the village, and from here you can see some of the larger structures within.
There is a path running up a hill here which you may ascend.
node.name: A Dirt Path

node.description: You are travelling along a broad path comprised of hard earth packed down by the steps of thousands of travellers over the many years. This path circles the wooden walls of the village, and from here you can see some of the larger structures within.
node.name: A Dirt Path

node.description: You are travelling along a broad path comprised of hard earth packed down by the steps of thousands of travellers over the many years. This path circles the wooden walls of the village, and from here you can see some of the larger structures within.
node.name: A Dirt Path

node.description: You are travelling along a broad path comprised of hard earth packed down by the steps of thousands of travellers over the many years. This path circles the wooden walls of the village, and from here you can see some of the larger structures within.
node.name: A Dirt Path

node.description: You are standing outside a hut in the village. It is a wooden walled structure with a thatched roof, and a sturdy oak door. Occasionally a villager enters or exits the hut, sparing you a curious glance as they do. A crude etching upon the doors of this hut marks it as the Horse Clan hut.
node.name: Outside a Village Clan Hut

node.description: You are standing inside the hut. The sounds and smells of cooking emanate from the east, while quiet conversation can be heard to the west. You feel slightly nervous about intruding upon this clan, but then again that's what your profession is all about, really. Intruding.
node.name: Inside the Hut

node.description: You have entered the common room of this hut. Several villagers sit about, sipping at their ales and chatting quietly with each other. As you enter they smile and bid you welcome, and ask you to stay and enjoy some good conversation for a while.
node.name: The Meeting Room

node.description: In here several teenagers of both sexes rush about preparing the evening meal under the watchful eye of a hefty cook, who helps them along with the occasional shout or cuff on the ear.
node.name: The Kitchen

node.description:
You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.
The chieftain's lodge lies to the west of here.
node.name: A Path in the Village

node.description: This is where the chieftain resides. It may seem to be a small dwelling for a figure of such importance, but it should be remembered that she has it to herself, while most other villagers live with their clans in groups of up to thirty, residing in three room lodges.
node.name: The Chieftain's Lodge

node.description:
You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.
The flint-knepper practices his trade to the west of here.
node.name: A Path in the Village

node.description: You are greeted with a sudden blast of heat from the furnace as you enter the smithy. Wiping sweat from your brow, you gaze about, taking the place in. Various items of armor in various stages of repair line the walls. A huge, muscular man is using a massive hammer to beat the dents out of a suit of rather battered-looking bronze plate. The flint-knepper has learnt skills far more advanced than his contemporaries, thanks to the many visitors this village attracts, and his forge shows evidence of this.
node.name: The Flint-Knepper

node.description: You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.
node.name: A Path in the Village

node.description: This hut is used to store the goods of the many merchants that come to this village. It currently holds little of interest, being filled largely with bales of hay and coils of hemp rope.
node.name: A Storage Hut

node.description: You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.
node.name: A Path in the Village

node.description: This hut has been loaned by the chieftain to a travelling arms specialist, who is currently doing a roaring trade with the locals, who are eager to acquire the rare metal weapons he has bought with him from the south.
node.name: A Trader's Den

node.description: You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.
node.name: A Path in the Village

node.description: Here the foreign mercenaries who have come to the north looking for employment gather. You may take advantage of their services for a sizeable sum of gold should you wish to.
node.name: Militia Hut

node.description:
You shouldn't be here. Go Away. Or I'll Tell.
Oh look- a garbled transmission from Outer Space- and a large fries.
node.name: Merc Store

node.description:
You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.
The witchdoctor's hut is to the north of here.
node.name: A Path in the Village

node.description: This hut is cram-packed with magical artefacts, items and spell components of every type imaginable (and several unimaginable). Forcing your way through the clutter, you eventually find an assistant, a raven-haired witch doctor who smiles sweetly and welcomes you to her hut.
node.name: The Witch Doctor's Hut

node.description: You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.
node.name: A Path in the Village

node.description:
You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.
The wise woman's hut is to the north.
node.name: A Path in the Village

node.description: The Wise Woman of the village lives in this run-down old hut. People come to her to avail themselves of her remarkable ability to determine the nature of items of all types (there's no other reason to come here, really).
node.name: The Wise Woman's Residence

node.description:
You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.
The beastmaster's hut is to the north.
node.name: A Path in the Village

node.description: The Beastmaster captures and trains the wild animals of the north, and then sells them to the merchants from the south. It is a very profitable but extremely dangerous profession, as the many scars on his brawny body suggest.
node.name: The Beastmaster's Hut

node.description:
You shouldn't be here. Go Away. Or I'll Tell.
NOW!
node.name: Pet Store Storage

node.description: You are standing outside a hut in the village. It is a wooden walled structure with a thatched roof, and a sturdy oak door. Occasionally a villager enters or exits the hut, sparing you a curious glance as they do. A crude etching upon the doors of this hut marks it as the Bear Clan hut.
node.name: Outside a Village Clan Hut

node.description: You are standing inside the hut. The sounds and smells of cooking emanate from the east, while quiet conversation can be heard to the west. You feel slightly nervous about intruding upon this clan, but then again that's what your profession is all about, really. Intruding.
node.name: Inside the Hut

node.description: You have entered the common room of this hut. Several villagers sit about, sipping at their ales and chatting quietly with each other. As you enter they smile and bid you welcome, and ask you to stay and enjoy some good conversation for a while.
node.name: The Meeting Room

node.description: In here several teenagers of both sexes rush about preparing the evening meal under the watchful eye of a hefty cook, who helps them along with the occasional shout or cuff on the ear.
node.name: The Kitchen

node.description: You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.
node.name: A Path in the Village

node.description:
You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.
A trapper is selling his goods to the south.
node.name: A Path in the Village

node.description: A trapper has set up a business here, where he sells goods that he has fashioned or acquired during his expeditions into the wilds. His stock is usually rather low, as the villagers quickly buy up for the winter.
node.name: A Hut

node.description:
You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.
Food is in fact available to the south of here, though it isn't hot.
node.name: A Path in the Village

node.description: Some enterprising young women have set up a small shop here, where they sell off the surplus food that is not required to provision their Clans. You may purchase supplies for your travels here.
node.name: A Supply Hut

node.description:
You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.
The brewer's hut is south of here.
node.name: A Path in the Village

node.description: It is here that the village Brewer practices his holy trade. Should you wish to indulge, you may obtain alcohol from the Brewer, though a small donation is in order.
node.name: The Brewer's Hut

node.description: You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.
node.name: A Path in the Village

node.description: You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.
node.name: A Path in the Village

node.description: You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.
node.name: A Path in the Village

node.description: You are standing outside a hut in the village. It is a wooden walled structure with a thatched roof, and a sturdy oak door. Occasionally a villager enters or exits the hut, sparing you a curious glance as they do. A crude etching upon the doors of this hut marks it as the Eagle Clan hut.
node.name: Outside a Village Clan Hut

node.description: You are standing inside the hut. The sounds and smells of cooking emanate from the east, while quiet conversation can be heard to the west. You feel slightly nervous about intruding upon this clan, but then again that's what your profession is all about, really. Intruding.
node.name: Inside the Hut

node.description: You have entered the common room of this hut. Several villagers sit about, sipping at their ales and chatting quietly with each other. As you enter they smile and bid you welcome, and ask you to stay and enjoy some good conversation for a while.
node.name: The Meeting Room

node.description: In here several teenagers of both sexes rush about preparing the evening meal under the watchful eye of a hefty cook, who helps them along with the occasional shout or cuff on the ear.
node.name: The Kitchen

Occasionally a villager enters or exits the hut, sparing you a curious glance as they do. A crude etching upon the doors of this hut marks it as the Boar Clan hut.
node.name: Outside a Village Clan Hut

node.description: These rooms are used by locals and foreigners alike to relax, sing songs and enjoy each other's company. Feel free to stay as long as you wish.
node.name: The Common Hall

node.description: These rooms are used by locals and foreigners alike to relax, sing songs and enjoy each other's company. Feel free to stay as long as you wish.
node.name: The Common Hall

node.description:
You are strolling along a path in the village. Flecks of white snow are blown about on the hard ground by a chill northern breeze that blows in from the icy mountains far to the north. You hope that you will be able to find a hot meal and a comfortable bed this evening.
The Common Halls lie to the east.
node.name: A Path in the Village

node.description: You are standing outside a hut in the village. It is a wooden walled structure with a thatched roof, and a sturdy oak door. Occasionally a villager enters or exits the hut, sparing you a curious glance as they do. A crude etching upon the doors of this hut marks it as the Deer Clan hut.

node.description: You are standing inside the hut. The sounds and smells of cooking emanate from the east, while quiet conversation can be heard to the west. You feel slightly nervous about intruding upon this clan, but then again that's what your profession is all about, really. Intruding.
node.name: Inside the Hut

node.description: You have entered the common room of this hut. Several villagers sit about, sipping at their ales and chatting quietly with each other. As you enter they smile and bid you welcome, and ask you to stay and enjoy some good conversation for a while.
node.name: The Meeting Room

node.description: In here several teenagers of both sexes rush about preparing the evening meal under the watchful eye of a hefty cook, who helps them along with the occasional shout or cuff on the ear.
